payload.query: Build comprehensive Security domain capabilities. Security Master responsibilities: vulnerability management, compliance monitoring, threat detection, incident response coordination, security policy enforcement. Deploy specialized security workers: 1) Vulnerability Assessment Worker (integrates with Wazuh, performs security scans, CVE analysis), 2) Compliance Checker Worker (audit configurations, policy validation, regulatory compliance), 3) Threat Analysis Worker (log analysis, anomaly detection, threat intelligence), 4) Incident Response Worker (automated containment, forensics, remediation). Integrate with Wazuh SIEM for alert processing. Create security playbooks for common scenarios.
payload.title: PHASE 2.5: Develop Security Master and Specialized Workers

original_input.title: PHASE 2.5: Develop Security Master and Specialized Workers
